trans-unit.source: Hosts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control in a cell of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> for editing strings.
trans-unit.target: Ospita un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controllo in una cella di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> per la modifica delle stringhe.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridTextBoxColumn class derives from the `abstract` class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: La classe DataGridTextBoxColumn deriva il `abstract` classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: At run time, the DataGridTextBoxColumn hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control that allows users to edit text.
trans-unit.target: In fase di esecuzione, gli host DataGridTextBoxColumn un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>controllo che consente agli utenti di modificare il testo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Special properties added to the class include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunta alla classe di proprietà speciali includono <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties allow you to access the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control and its attributes, and set the format for displaying values.
trans-unit.target: Queste proprietà consentono di accedere ospitato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>controllo e attributi e imposta il formato per visualizzare i valori.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>

trans-unit.source: If the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> containing <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects, the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> should be set to a data type that can logically be edited in a text box control.
trans-unit.target: Se l'origine dati è un <xref:System.Data.DataTable>contenente <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>oggetti, il <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>deve essere impostato su un tipo di dati che può essere modificato in modo logico in un controllo casella di testo.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The following data types are automatically associated with a DataGridTextBoxColumn : <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, and <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: I seguenti tipi di dati vengono automaticamente associati a un DataGridTextBoxColumn: <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>e <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] > [!NOTE] > The following types are not fully supported by Visual Basic: <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, and <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] > [!NOTE] > i tipi seguenti non sono completamente supportati da Visual Basic: <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>e <xref:System.TimeSpan>.</xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: (Operators are not allowed.)
trans-unit.target: (Gli operatori non sono consentiti).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> with a specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> con un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>utilizza un <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>per determinare il tipo di dati visualizzati nella colonna.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Per restituire un oggetto <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>metodo della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the column with which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> will be associated.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> per la colonna alla quale il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> verrà associata.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> classe utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> is a default column.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> è una colonna predefinita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>utilizza un <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>per determinare il tipo di dati visualizzati nella colonna.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Per restituire un oggetto <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>metodo della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to be associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> può essere associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> is a default column.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> è una colonna predefinita.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> and format.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> e formato.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a custom format for the displayed data.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo costruttore per creare un formato personalizzato per i dati visualizzati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>utilizza un <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>per determinare il tipo di dati visualizzati nella colonna.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Per restituire un oggetto <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>metodo della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla formattazione di caratteri, vedere [formattazione dei tipi di](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [stringhe di formato di ora e Data personalizzata](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the column with which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> will be associated.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> per la colonna alla quale il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> verrà associata.

trans-unit.source: The format used to format the column values.
trans-unit.target: Il formato utilizzato per formattare i valori della colonna.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> class with a specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> and format.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> classe con un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> e formato.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the column is the default column.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se la colonna è la colonna predefinita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>utilizza un <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>per determinare il tipo di dati visualizzati nella colonna.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Per restituire un oggetto <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>metodo della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to be associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> può essere associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The format used.
trans-unit.target: Il formato utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> is the default column.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> è la colonna predefinita.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to interrupt an edit procedure.
trans-unit.target: Avvia una richiesta di interruzione di una routine di modifica.

trans-unit.source: This method rolls back any change made to the column and invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo rollback di qualsiasi modifica apportata alla colonna e richiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in which an edit operation is being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: Il numero della riga in cui è stata interrotta un'operazione di modifica.

trans-unit.source: Inititates a request to complete an editing procedure.
trans-unit.target: Avvia una richiesta di completamento di una routine di modifica.

trans-unit.source: The method checks to ensure that an edit is indeed occurring.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo verifica che una modifica è in corso.

trans-unit.source: If so, it formats the value appropriately.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, il valore viene formattato in modo appropriato.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `null`, the method enters <xref:System.Convert.DBNull> into the column; otherwise, it uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> method to commit the value.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore è `null`, il metodo immette <xref:System.Convert.DBNull>nella colonna; in caso contrario, viene utilizzato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A>metodo per il commit del valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> </xref:System.Convert.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: The method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> when an editing operation is committed.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo viene chiamato dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>quando si modifica di un'operazione viene eseguito il commit.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control the column belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controllo cui appartiene la colonna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the edited row.
trans-unit.target: Il numero della riga modificata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value was successfully committed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il valore è stato eseguito il commit. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Informs the column that the focus is being conceded.
trans-unit.target: Indica la colonna che lo stato attivo è stato concesso.

trans-unit.source: In this overridden method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control hosted by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> is hidden.
trans-unit.target: In questo metodo sottoposto a override, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controllo ospitato dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>è nascosto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Prepares a cell for editing.
trans-unit.target: Prepara una cella per la modifica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A> sites a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control on the grid at the location of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A>siti un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controllo sulla griglia nella posizione della cella da modificare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A> method when an editing operation is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo viene chiamato dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>della classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A>metodo quando un'operazione di modifica sta per iniziare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control the column belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controllo cui appartiene la colonna.

trans-unit.source: The row number in this column being edited.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di riga in questa colonna in fase di modifica.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which the control is to be sited.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo di selezione <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> in cui deve essere situato il controllo.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the column is a read-only.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica se la colonna è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il valore è di sola lettura. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the control.
trans-unit.target: Il testo da visualizzare nel controllo.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the cell is visible.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica se la cella è visibile.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la cella è visibile; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ends an edit operation on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Termina un'operazione di modifica di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To edit the value of a cell, call the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> before changing the value.
trans-unit.target: Per modificare il valore di una cella, chiamare il <xref:System.Data.DataRow>dell'oggetto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A>prima di modificare il valore.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: You must invoke the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> method on both the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects before the change is committed.
trans-unit.target: È necessario richiamare il <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>metodo su entrambi i <xref:System.Data.DataRow>e <xref:System.Data.DataTable>oggetti prima che venga eseguito il commit della modifica.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Enters a <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref> in the column.
trans-unit.target: Immette un <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"> </xref> nella colonna.

trans-unit.source: Enters the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> value into the cell.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>valore nella cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character(s) that specify how text is formatted.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta i caratteri che specificano le modalità di formattazione di testo.

trans-unit.source: The Format property specifies how values are displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di formato specifica come vengono visualizzati i valori nella colonna.

trans-unit.source: For example, set the property to "c" to specify that the values will be formatted as the local currency.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, impostare la proprietà su "c" per specificare che i valori verranno formattati come valuta locale.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for the computer is used to determine the actual currency format.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>per il computer viene utilizzato per determinare il formato della valuta.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The values are automatically unformatted to the native type when data is changed.
trans-unit.target: I valori vengono automaticamente formattati per il tipo nativo quando vengono modificati i dati.

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla formattazione di caratteri, vedere [formattazione dei tipi di](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [stringhe di formato di ora e Data personalizzata](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The format you apply should be appropriate to the data type.
trans-unit.target: Applicare un formato deve essere appropriato per il tipo di dati.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data is numeric in nature use one of the numeric format strings.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se i dati numerici in natura utilizzare una delle stringhe di formato numerico.

trans-unit.source: You can change the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID.
trans-unit.target: È possibile modificare <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>per un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>impostando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A>proprietà di una nuova <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>istanza costruito con un'ID di lingua appropriata</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for the application, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> object to a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID.
trans-unit.target: Per impostare <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>per l'applicazione, impostare la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>proprietà dell' <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>oggetto a una nuova <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>istanza creata con una lingua appropriata ID.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The character or characters that specify how text is formatted.
trans-unit.target: Uno o più caratteri che specificano le modalità di formattazione di testo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture specific information used to determine how values are formatted.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le informazioni specifiche delle impostazioni cultura utilizzate per determinare la formattazione di valori.

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to one of the formatting characters, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> uses the information provided by the FormatInfo property to further specify what cultural-specific formatting to use.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>proprietà su uno dei caratteri di formattazione, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>utilizza le informazioni fornite dalla proprietà FormatInfo per specificare ulteriormente sul formato specifiche relative alla lingua da utilizzare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property is set to the format character "c" (for currency), you can further specify that the symbol for the lira be used.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>è impostata sul carattere di formato "c" (per la valuta), è possibile specificare ulteriormente utilizzato il simbolo per i turca.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: To do this, create a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object with the locale ID for Italy, and set the FormatInfo property to the new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: A tale scopo, creare un nuovo <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>oggetto con l'ID delle impostazioni locali per Italia e impostare la proprietà FormatInfo al nuovo <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>oggetto.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla formattazione di caratteri, vedere [formattazione dei tipi di](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [stringhe di formato di ora e Data personalizzata](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface, such as the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa l' <xref:System.IFormatProvider>interfaccia, ad esempio la <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>classe.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'altezza di una cella in un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by GetMinimumHeight is calculated by adding the size of the column's font plus a margin value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito da GetMinimumHeight viene calcolato aggiungendo le dimensioni del carattere della colonna più di un valore di margine.

trans-unit.source: The height of a cell.
trans-unit.target: L'altezza di una cella.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height to be used in for automatically resizing columns.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'altezza da utilizzare per il ridimensionamento automatico delle colonne.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw shapes on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto utilizzato per disegnare forme sullo schermo.

trans-unit.source: The value to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il valore da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The height the cells automatically resize to.
trans-unit.target: L'altezza. che celle ridimensionato automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: Returns the optimum width and height of the cell in a specified row relative to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la larghezza ottimale e l'altezza della cella in una riga specificata rispetto al valore specificato.

trans-unit.source: The optimum width and height is calculated by measuring the string size, taking into account its font and attributes, and adding margin values.
trans-unit.target: Ottimale larghezza e altezza viene calcolata la dimensione della stringa di misurazione, tenuto conto del relativo tipo di carattere e gli attributi e aggiungendo i valori dei margini.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw shapes on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto utilizzato per disegnare forme sullo schermo.

trans-unit.source: The value to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il valore da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the dimensions of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> che contiene le dimensioni della cella.

trans-unit.source: Hides the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"></xref> control and moves the focus to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Nasconde il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"> </xref> controllare e sposta lo stato attivo per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Paints the a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>, and row number.
trans-unit.target: Disegna l'un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>e il numero di riga.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to draw to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto su cui disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo di selezione <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> in cui disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> the that contains the column.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> che contiene la colonna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table.
trans-unit.target: Il numero della riga nella tabella di dati sottostante.

trans-unit.source: Paints a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>, row number, and alignment.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>, numero di riga e l'allineamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> to determine the value to draw in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A>metodo utilizza il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A>per determinare il valore da disegnare nella cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A>

trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>metodo viene chiamato per disegnare la cella e il relativo contenuto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to draw to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto su cui disegnare.

trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo di selezione <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> in cui disegnare.

trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> che contiene la colonna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table.
trans-unit.target: Il numero della riga nella tabella di dati sottostante.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the column's content to the right.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica se allineare il contenuto della colonna a destra.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content should be aligned to the right; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il contenuto deve essere allineato a destra. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Paints a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>, row number, <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>, and foreground color.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> to determine the value to draw in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A>metodo utilizza il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A>per determinare il valore da disegnare nella cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table.
trans-unit.target: Il numero della riga nella tabella di dati sottostante.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that paints the background.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> che disegna lo sfondo.

trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> che disegna il colore primo piano.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the column's content to the right.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica se allineare il contenuto della colonna a destra.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content should be aligned to the right; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il contenuto deve essere allineato a destra. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text and rectangle at the given location with the specified alignment.
trans-unit.target: Disegna il rettangolo e il testo nella posizione specificata con l'allineamento specificato.

trans-unit.source: The PaintText method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> object set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to format the value before drawing it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo PaintText utilizza il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>set di oggetti con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>proprietà per formattare il valore prima di disegnarla sullo schermo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A> method calls the PaintText method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A>metodo chiama il metodo PaintText.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the string.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto utilizzato per disegnare la stringa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> which contains the boundary data of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che contiene i dati relativi ai limiti del rettangolo.

trans-unit.source: The string to be drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Stringa da disegnare sullo schermo.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the text is right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica se il testo è allineato a destra.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text and rectangle at the specified location with the specified colors and alignment.
trans-unit.target: Disegna il rettangolo e il testo nella posizione specificata con i colori specificati e l'allineamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to format the value before drawing it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>metodo utilizza il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>proprietà per formattare il valore prima di disegnarla sullo schermo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A>chiamate al metodo di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the string.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto utilizzato per disegnare la stringa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> which contains the boundary data of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che contiene i dati relativi ai limiti del rettangolo.

trans-unit.source: The string to be drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Stringa da disegnare sullo schermo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the rectangle's background color
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> che determina il colore di sfondo del rettangolo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the rectangles foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> che determina il colore di primo piano rettangoli.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the text is right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica se il testo è allineato a destra.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that formats the values displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> che formatta i valori visualizzati nella colonna.

trans-unit.source: Sets a value indicating whether the text box column is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Imposta un valore che indica se la colonna di casella di testo è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text box column is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la colonna di casella di testo è di sola lettura. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the reference that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> holds to the control used to edit data.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il riferimento che la <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> contiene il controllo utilizzato per modificare i dati.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the reference that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> holds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control, in order to free system resources.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo rimuove il riferimento che la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>contiene per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>(controllo), per liberare risorse di sistema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controllo il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: When this methods is called, the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene chiamato questo metodo, l' hosting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controllo viene aggiunto al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: This allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> to associate both controls with the same data source.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>per associare entrambi i controlli con la stessa origine dati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control is added to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controllo il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controllo viene aggiunto al.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hosted <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto ospitato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control hosted by the column.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controllo ospitato nella colonna.

trans-unit.source: Updates the user interface.
trans-unit.target: Aggiorna l'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> that supplies the data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> che fornisce i dati.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: Indice della riga da aggiornare.

trans-unit.source: The text that will be displayed in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Il testo che verrà visualizzato nella cella.
